mapper.select: select group_concat(distinct(day_week)) day_weeks, concat(group_concat(distinct(class_str_time)), ',') AS class_str_time, concat(group_concat(distinct(class_end_time)), ',') AS class_end_time from ext_timetable where ext_id in ( select ext_id from app_class where user_id = #{user_id} and reg_stus = '결제완료') and decide_yn = 'y' group by day_week

select ext_id, group_concat(distinct(day_week)) AS day_weeks, group_concat(distinct(class_str_time)) AS class_str_time, group_concat(distinct(class_end_time)) AS class_end_time from ext_timetable where ext_id in (select ext_id from ext_info where end_rc_date >= now()) group by ext_id, day_week
select count(carrer_id) from carrer c, ext_info e where c.user_id = e.user_id and e.ext_id = #{ext_id}
select e.* from ext_info e, user_info u where e.ext_id in (select ext_id from app_class where user_id = #{user_id}) and e.user_id = u.user_id
